Acqua Di Gio was my very first cologne I’ve ever owned in high school and was my signature scent for quite a while until I got a couple more  fragrances to add to my collection and would alternate between them. I’ve only ever bought that one bottle of Acqua but to me it’s still a nostalgic scent.
I'd love to join the giveaway. I've never tried the original Acqua Di Gio. I do have Profumo and Profondo, and tried Profondo Lights

comments_since_last_sample.body: Have around 37 colognes since I started in February and have never tried ADG despite hearing only praise
The Original ADG was my first ever fragrance, also my most complimented ever. Year round frag and you just can't over spray it.
I used to wear ADG in middle school! Probably the first fragrance I ever purchased!
I remember smelling ADG in a macys when I was 14 with all my friends in a mall. Brings back those memories whenever I smell it. Would live to get a bottle of it with this giveaway
